message.plain: You must be authenticated to access this resource.
message.markdown:
**Authentication Required**

You must be authenticated to access this resource. Please log in and try again.
message.html:
Authentication Required

You must be authenticated to access this resource. Please log in and try again.

message.plain: The username or password provided is incorrect.
message.markdown:
**Invalid Credentials**

The username or password you provided is incorrect. Please check your credentials and try again.
message.html:
Invalid Credentials

The username or password you provided is incorrect. Please check your credentials and try again.

message.plain: Your authentication token has expired. Please log in again.
message.markdown:
**Token Expired**

Your authentication token has expired. Please log in again to continue.
message.html:
Token Expired

Your authentication token has expired. Please log in again to continue.

message.plain: Single Sign-On authentication failed. Please try again or contact support.
message.markdown:
**SSO Authentication Failed**

Single Sign-On authentication failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
message.html:
SSO Authentication Failed

Single Sign-On authentication failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

message.plain: You do not have permission to perform this action.
message.markdown:
**Insufficient Permissions**

You do not have the required permissions to perform this action.
message.html:
Insufficient Permissions

You do not have the required permissions to perform this action.

message.plain: This operation requires administrator privileges.
message.markdown:
**Admin Access Required**

This operation requires administrator privileges. Please contact your system administrator.
message.html:
Admin Access Required

This operation requires administrator privileges. Please contact your system administrator.

message.plain: You do not have access to this course.
message.markdown:
**Course Access Denied**

You do not have access to this course. Please enroll or contact the course instructor.
message.html:
Course Access Denied

You do not have access to this course. Please enroll or contact the course instructor.

message.plain: Your course role is insufficient for this operation.
message.markdown:
**Insufficient Course Role**

Your current role in this course does not allow this operation. Required role: {required_role}.
message.html:
Insufficient Course Role

Your current role in this course does not allow this operation. Required role: {required_role}.

message.plain: The request data is invalid or malformed.
message.markdown:
**Invalid Request Data**

The request data you provided is invalid or malformed. Please check your input and try again.
message.html:
Invalid Request Data

The request data you provided is invalid or malformed. Please check your input and try again.

message.plain: A required field is missing from the request.
message.markdown:
**Missing Required Field**

A required field is missing from your request: `{field_name}`.
message.html:
Missing Required Field

A required field is missing from your request: {field_name}.

message.plain: A field has an invalid format.
message.markdown:
**Invalid Field Format**

The field `{field_name}` has an invalid format. Expected: {expected_format}.
message.html:
Invalid Field Format

The field {field_name} has an invalid format. Expected: {expected_format}.

message.plain: The uploaded file is invalid or exceeds size limits.
message.markdown:
**Invalid File Upload**

The uploaded file is invalid or exceeds size limits. Maximum size: {max_size}.
message.html:
Invalid File Upload

The uploaded file is invalid or exceeds size limits. Maximum size: {max_size}.

message.plain: The requested resource was not found.
message.markdown:
**Resource Not Found**

The requested resource was not found. It may have been deleted or the URL is incorrect.
message.html:
Resource Not Found

The requested resource was not found. It may have been deleted or the URL is incorrect.

message.plain: The specified user was not found.
message.markdown:
**User Not Found**

The specified user was not found in the system.
message.html:
User Not Found

The specified user was not found in the system.

message.plain: The specified course was not found.
message.markdown:
**Course Not Found**

The specified course was not found or you do not have permission to access it.
message.html:
Course Not Found

The specified course was not found or you do not have permission to access it.

message.plain: The requested API endpoint does not exist.
message.markdown:
**Endpoint Not Found**

The requested API endpoint does not exist. Please check the URL and API version.
message.html:
Endpoint Not Found

The requested API endpoint does not exist. Please check the URL and API version.

message.plain: A resource with this identifier already exists.
message.markdown:
**Resource Already Exists**

A resource with this identifier already exists. Use a different identifier or update the existing resource.
message.html:
Resource Already Exists

A resource with this identifier already exists. Use a different identifier or update the existing resource.

message.plain: The resource was modified by another user. Please refresh and try again.
message.markdown:
**Concurrent Modification**

The resource was modified by another user. Please refresh and try again.
message.html:
Concurrent Modification

The resource was modified by another user. Please refresh and try again.

message.plain: You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again later.
message.markdown:
**Rate Limit Exceeded**

You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again in {retry_after} seconds.
message.html:
Rate Limit Exceeded

You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again in {retry_after} seconds.

message.plain: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
message.markdown:
**Login Rate Limit Exceeded**

Too many login attempts for this username. Please wait {retry_after} seconds before trying again.
message.html:
Login Rate Limit Exceeded

Too many login attempts for this username. Please wait {retry_after} seconds before trying again.

message.plain: Too many test requests. Please wait before submitting another test.
message.markdown:
**Test Request Rate Limit Exceeded**

You are submitting tests too quickly. Please wait {retry_after} second before trying again.
message.html:
Test Request Rate Limit Exceeded

You are submitting tests too quickly. Please wait {retry_after} second before trying again.

message.plain: The requested course content was not found.
message.markdown:
**Course Content Not Found**

The requested course content (assignment, exercise, etc.) was not found or you do not have permission to access it.
message.html:
Course Content Not Found

The requested course content was not found or you do not have permission to access it.

message.plain: The content type for this assignment is not configured.
message.markdown:
**Content Type Not Configured**

The content type for this assignment is not properly configured. Please contact your instructor.
message.html:
Content Type Not Configured

The content type for this assignment is not properly configured. Please contact your instructor.

message.plain: This operation is not valid for this content type.
message.markdown:
**Invalid Content Type Operation**

This operation cannot be performed on this content type. For example, you cannot assign examples to non-submittable content.
message.html:
Invalid Content Type Operation

This operation cannot be performed on this content type.

message.plain: The requested example was not found.
message.markdown:
**Example Not Found**

The requested example or example version was not found.
message.html:
Example Not Found

The requested example or example version was not found.

message.plain: The requested example version was not found.
message.markdown:
**Example Version Not Found**

The requested version of this example was not found. It may not exist or may have been deleted.
message.html:
Example Version Not Found

The requested version of this example was not found.

message.plain: This assignment has not been released yet.
message.markdown:
**Assignment Not Released**

This assignment has not been released to students yet. Please wait for your instructor to release it.
message.html:
Assignment Not Released

This assignment has not been released to students yet.

message.plain: The requested deployment was not found.
message.markdown:
**Deployment Not Found**

The requested deployment configuration was not found.
message.html:
Deployment Not Found

The requested deployment configuration was not found.

message.plain: The GitLab repository is not configured for this resource.
message.markdown:
**Repository Not Configured**

The GitLab repository has not been configured. Please contact your administrator.
message.html:
Repository Not Configured

The GitLab repository has not been configured. Please contact your administrator.

message.plain: Required deployment information is missing.
message.markdown:
**Missing Deployment Information**

Required deployment information (path, version, etc.) is missing. The assignment may not be properly configured.
message.html:
Missing Deployment Information

Required deployment information is missing.

message.plain: The requested submission artifact was not found.
message.markdown:
**Submission Artifact Not Found**

The requested submission artifact was not found. You may need to submit first.
message.html:
Submission Artifact Not Found

The requested submission artifact was not found.

message.plain: The requested submission group was not found.
message.markdown:
**Submission Group Not Found**

The requested submission group was not found or you do not have access to it.
message.html:
Submission Group Not Found

The requested submission group was not found or you do not have access to it.

message.plain: A test is already running for this submission.
message.markdown:
**Test Already Running**

A test is already running for this submission. Please wait for it to complete before starting another test.
message.html:
Test Already Running

A test is already running for this submission.

message.plain: You have reached the maximum number of test runs for this submission.
message.markdown:
**Maximum Test Runs Exceeded**

You have reached the maximum number of test runs allowed for this submission.
message.html:
Maximum Test Runs Exceeded

You have reached the maximum number of test runs allowed.

message.plain: The execution backend for this assignment is not configured.
message.markdown:
**Execution Backend Not Configured**

The execution backend for this assignment is not properly configured. Please contact your instructor.
message.html:
Execution Backend Not Configured

The execution backend is not configured.

message.plain: A version identifier (commit) is required for testing.
message.markdown:
**Version Identifier Required**

A version identifier (commit hash) is required to test your submission. Please ensure your submission includes version information.
message.html:
Version Identifier Required

A version identifier is required for testing.

message.plain: You must provide either an artifact ID or submission group ID to test.
message.markdown:
**Test Identifier Required**

You must provide either an artifact ID or submission group ID to identify what to test.
message.html:
Test Identifier Required

You must provide an identifier for what to test.

message.plain: You have already tested this artifact. Multiple tests are not allowed unless the previous test crashed or was cancelled.
message.markdown:
**Artifact Already Tested**

You have already successfully tested this artifact. Multiple tests are not allowed unless the previous test crashed or was cancelled.
message.html:
Artifact Already Tested

You have already tested this artifact. Multiple tests are not allowed unless the previous test crashed or was cancelled.

message.plain: The requested task execution was not found.
message.markdown:
**Task Not Found**

The requested task execution was not found or you do not have permission to view it.
message.html:
Task Not Found

The requested task execution was not found.

message.plain: Failed to submit the task for execution.
message.markdown:
**Task Submission Failed**

Failed to submit the task to the execution system. Please try again or contact support.
message.html:
Task Submission Failed

Failed to submit the task for execution.

message.plain: The execution backend type is not supported.
message.markdown:
**Unsupported Execution Backend**

The execution backend type configured for this assignment is not supported.
message.html:
Unsupported Execution Backend

The execution backend type is not supported.

message.plain: You are not a member of this course.
message.markdown:
**Course Membership Not Found**

You are not enrolled as a member of this course.
message.html:
Course Membership Not Found

You are not enrolled in this course.

message.plain: GitLab service is temporarily unavailable.
message.markdown:
**GitLab Service Unavailable**

The GitLab service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
message.html:
GitLab Service Unavailable

The GitLab service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

message.plain: Failed to authenticate with GitLab.
message.markdown:
**GitLab Authentication Failed**

Failed to authenticate with GitLab. Please check API token configuration.
message.html:
GitLab Authentication Failed

Failed to authenticate with GitLab. Please check API token configuration.

message.plain: Object storage service is temporarily unavailable.
message.markdown:
**MinIO Service Unavailable**

The object storage service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
message.html:
MinIO Service Unavailable

The object storage service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

message.plain: Workflow service is temporarily unavailable.
message.markdown:
**Temporal Service Unavailable**

The workflow orchestration service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
message.html:
Temporal Service Unavailable

The workflow orchestration service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

message.plain: Unable to connect to the database.
message.markdown:
**Database Connection Failed**

Unable to connect to the database. The service is temporarily unavailable.
message.html:
Database Connection Failed

Unable to connect to the database. The service is temporarily unavailable.

message.plain: A database query failed. Please try again.
message.markdown:
**Database Query Failed**

A database query failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
message.html:
Database Query Failed

A database query failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

message.plain: Database transaction failed and was rolled back.
message.markdown:
**Transaction Failed**

The database transaction failed and was rolled back. No changes were made.
message.html:
Transaction Failed

The database transaction failed and was rolled back. No changes were made.

message.plain: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
message.markdown:
**Internal Server Error**

An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support.
message.html:
Internal Server Error

An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support.

message.plain: Server configuration error. Please contact administrator.
message.markdown:
**Configuration Error**

A server configuration error occurred. Please contact your administrator.
message.html:
Configuration Error

A server configuration error occurred. Please contact your administrator.

message.plain: This feature is not yet implemented.
message.markdown:
**Feature Not Implemented**

This feature is not yet implemented. Check the documentation for available alternatives.
message.html:
Feature Not Implemented

This feature is not yet implemented. Check the documentation for available alternatives.
